attributes.action: Give the British People a Referendum On the European Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Ireland have said NO to the European Treaty in a Referendum, I believe that it is the British Governments DUTY to give us a chance to decide for ourselves if we want to give away so much power to an unelected body in the form of the European commision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
